pkgmetadata.longdescription: Plot Shipboard DAS Data // A utility program oriented to create maps, plot data, and do basic data summaries of DAS data files. These files are typically, but do not have to be DAS https://swfsc- publications.fisheries.noaa.gov/publications/TM/SWFSC/NOAA-TM- NMFS-SWFSC-305.PDF data produced by the Southwest Fisheries Science Center (SWFSC) program 'WinCruz'.
